description: I. Capital gains tax (CGT): relief on disposal of a business (entrepreneurs' relief). 3 p. II. Finance Bill 2008 schedules: capital gains tax reforms. 16 p. III. Questions and answers on the CGT reform announced at pre-budget report 2007. 5 p. IV. Finance Bill 2008: draft explanatory note on draft clause and schedule for capital gains tax reforms. 18 p. IV.
